entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
